Reviews.Title: very good product for the price
Reviews.Author: James Jr.
Reviews.Content: all setup and installation was great. only downside was the bnc output for video was not clear. need vga output. hdmi would have been better.

Reviews.Title: "Happy Camper"
Reviews.Author: Gene
Reviews.Content: The quality and install out of the box feature was great.  I feel theI received a real bargain for $269.99.  A big bonus was callingthe customer support line, getting a clear and polite service rep.who spoke "the Kings English" was great.  I plan to buy moreSwann stuff.Gene

Reviews.Title: It is what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Roberto Armas
Reviews.Content: It is what I expected, the only inconvenience is that for ME is not easy to fallow the direction to program it. It doesn't show specific instructions, but still I am satisfy.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Hazel  Davis
Reviews.Content: This product great for small business, Checked prices and this was best deal.We bought monitor for viewing and is perfect for security. Recommend big monitor for best viewing.

ProductInfo.Features:
Record & view 4 channels of high quality video simultaneously in real time
Includes 4 all-weather, high resolution 480TVL cameras with powerful night vision to 65ft / 20m
Set & forget by recording continuously from 4 cameras for 30 days+ onto a massive 500GB hard drive, longer with motion detection
Save time & have peace of mind by easily locating incident video, then trim & transfer to USB flash drive
Remote viewing is easier than ever to set up with UPnP (Universal Plug n Play) auto network configuration
ProductInfo.Name: SWDVK426004 Black DVR Security System 4CCD Cameras
